Uses a sword called
a gunblade.
Special skill is
Renzokuken, using
the gunblade.
Silent, and a bit
cold.

Loves the hot dogs
sold in the Garden
cafeteria.
Uses close combat
fighting skills to
defeat enemies with
punches and kicks.

An expert marks-
man.  Can use
specialized bullets
to attack enemies.
Doesn't perform
very well under
pressure.

Uses a whip.
When in danger,
uses monster skills
she has learned.
Her admirers in the
Garden have
formed a fan club.

A member of the
Timber resistance
group,
‘Forest Owls'.
Uses her dog
to make special
attacks.

A transfer student
to Balamb Garden.
Uses giant
nunchaku and
special magic.

One of the top
fighters of the
Garden.  His
temperament kept
him from becoming
a SeeD member.
Uses a gunblade.

A sorceress.
As a sorceress,
she is well-versed
in magic.
Uses a special
magic attack
called Sorcery.

An energetic man
with a big heart.
Uses a machine gun.
Fires bursts at
enemies to help
party members in
danger.

Wears sharp blade
called Katal on
both arms.
His fighting style is
also unique, like his
weapon.

A big, powerful man.
Uses the Harpoon,
an unusually heavy
weapon, and
attacks by throwing
it at the enemy.

A Galbadian
machine that
attacks with magic
and missiles.
The more advanced
models use high-
powered beams.

A half-liquid
creature resistant
to physical
attacks.
Elemental weakness
differ with each one
that appears.

A monster on the
Galbadia continent.
Usually swoops down
to attack enemies,
but also bites and
causes wind gusts
when in danger.

Lives in humid
places.
It sneak-attacks
humans that pass
by.
Uses status attacks
when fully grown.

Has a rotating
blade around its
face.
Its battle tactics
change when its
face changes.

A floating monster
that uses Ice
magic.
When running low on
HP, uses Vampire
to suck HP from
opponents.

A living weapon
made by Galbadia.
Carries a 155mm
cannon on both
shoulders and a
60mm Vulcan
cannon in its mouth.

An older type of
Galbadian support
weapon.
Has a laser cannon,
but mostly punches
using the steel orbs
on both hands.

Has a large blade
for a horn.
This blade has a
healing effect when
used as an item or
to make magic.

Any magic attacks
are almost
completely
ineffective.
However, very weak
against physical
attacks.

Protects the hall of
Ultimecia Castle.
Defeated many
enemies whose
abilities were
sealed.

Sphinx's true form.
Attack tactics
change completely
in this form.
Summons other
monsters and uses
Doom.

Lives in the
northern snow
fields.  Takes time
to defeat because
of its high HP.
Uses Ice Breath
when angry.

|A large venomous
snake that uses
squeeze attacks.
Use caution when
its HP are low

Its body is mostly
a digestive bag.
Digests enemies by
catching them with
its vine.
Uses a gas attack
that causes Sleep.

Petrifies enemies
with its stare.
Uses thunder by
flapping its wings.
Uses Electrocute
when fully grown.

Uses an attack
called Ultra Waves
that damages all
enemies.

A type of bat with
a huge mouth.
Lurks in dark
places.
Dives quickly from
the air to bite its
target.

Becomes electrified
when attacked with
Thunder.
Attacking it while
electrified
causes thunder
damage.

A fish that swims
in the ground.
Only the fin can
be seen.
One theory says
that it may be a
shark.

A fish that swims
in the ground.
Only the fin can
be seen.
One theory says
that it may be a
shark.

Esthar's defective
weapon.
Attacks enemies
and allies alike.
Degenerator
destroys
opponents.

Has a flat black
body like a shadow.
Said to be a living
creature.
Kills its opponent
when it dies.

A type of mutated
dragon born with
six eyes.
Uses fire magic and
special breath
attacks.

Floats with gas
that fills its body.
Looks weak, but
its status-changing
attacks may prove
otherwise.

Anti-personnel
weapon made in
Esthar.
Floats with an anti-
gravity engine.
Attacks with its 4
pliable metallic legs.

The legs are small
compared to the
body, and it falls
easily when
attacked with force.

A bug monster
that flies.
Stay calm and
attack precisely.
It's not a very
strong enemy.

Changes tactics
as the battle
progresses.
Its magic also
changes from fire
to ice, to thunder,
etc.

A living weapon
Ultimecia made
out of a dragon.
Fire or ice are
its weak points,
but they change
when attacked.

Attacks with magic
and sharp claws.
When attacked,
it may change to
defense mode in
order to protect
itself from damage.

A strong monster,
but not good at
using magic.
Uses powerful
physical attacks
relying on its
strength instead.

Puts enemies to
sleep, then
attacks.  Spits
fluid which removes
an enemy's
strength while
asleep.

A monster that
posed as President
Deling.
Attacks with its
deformed arms and
status attacks.

A monster with 4
sharp claws.
Attacks with sheer
power, but also
uses gas attacks.

A monster with 3
heads.
The 2 heads on the
side are not real,
but they bite and
spit poison as if
they were.

Used to live in
water, but now
lives above ground.
Skewers enemies
with its large claw
and causes major
damage.

Born of a jewel in
Ultimecia's Castle.
Responds quickly
to attacks.
Counter-attacks
immediately.

A large left hand
protruding from the
earth.
Sometimes cures
party members
with status
abnormalities.

A large right hand
protruding the
earth.
Can't use magic.
Uses its strength
to attack with
force.

A dragon that walks
on 2 legs.
Attacks with breath
that causes status
changes and drops
a rare item called
Fury Fragment.

Undead soldier.
Not afraid of death.
Its death blow kills
enemies with 1 hit.

A monster powered
by fire.  Usually
calm, but still a
dangerous monster
that becomes
gigantic or explodes
when attacked.

A head protruding
the earth.
Only a part of the
body is exposed.
Uses Earthquake
when attacked by
enemies.

Likes to live in
forests.
Attacks with its
tentacles and also
uses status-
changing attacks.

Its high defense
ability makes it
difficult to defeat.
Owns rare items
that make it worth
the effort.

A monster with 4
heads that use
magic, physical,
attacks, status-
changes, and their
original skill, Aqua
Breath.

Uses Bad Breath,
which causes all
status
abnormalities.
Be ready with
status defenses
before fighting.

Hard to damage due
to the steel armor.
Doesn't use magic,
but its sword
causes significant
damage.

Uses powerful
magic, such as
Meteor.
A strong enemy
that's hard to
defeat.

Alive since the
beginning of time,
its power and HP
are very high.
It's better to run
if you encounter
one.

Strong and smart
dragon.
If enemies are using
Reflect, it casts
Reflect on itself to
mirror the attack.

A smaller type of
dragon, sometimes
appears in groups
of 2.
May be more
dangerous than
other dragons.

A monster shaped
like a face.
Uses support magic
and special attacks
when attacking with
Righty and Lefty
together.

A speedy cactus of
the desert.
Damage always
amounts to 1,000
with its special
skill, 1,000 Needles.

Mysterious being
living in dungeons.
Walks slowly toward
the enemy and kills
that enemy with the
Chef's Knife.

Uses multiple
magic attacks while
sitting down.
Even more powerful
when it stands up
to use its blaster
attacks.

A giant walking
mushroom.  Uses
status change
attacks with
damage attacks.

A devilish-looking
monster with wings.
Uses powerful magic
despite its small
size.

An alien from
another planet.
Someone destroyed
its UFO, and the
alien is in need of
help.
|Fire GF
column5:
uses fire
magic.  It's a
strong opponent,
but, as it is a part
of Garden's exam,
not impossible to
defeat.|

Text:
Sacred's older
brother.
This Earth GF has
healing ability, 
as long as his feet
are on the ground.

Earth GF
in Tomb of the
Unknown King.
Recovers by power
of the earth.
Attacks with a
large steel orb.

Galbadia Missile
Base security
leader.
Stronger than
regular Galbadian
soldiers.

A 3-headed demon-
dog of hell.
In Triple, each of
the 3 heads uses
different magic.
The tail is also
powerful.

A mysterious GF
living in another
dimension.
Uses a powerful
gravity attack
called Gravija.
|Called the King of\nGF
column5:
its Mega Flare
ignores all defense.
Gives assistance
freely to those who
show their power.|

Text:
A defense shelter
protecting Master
NORG.  The shelter
must be destroyed
in order to attack
NORG, who is inside
the shelter.
NOT A TARGET.

A legendary GF
that sleeps in
a dungeon.
Zantetsuken cuts
anything that
stands in its way.

Galbadian soldier
that uses magic
with a sword.
Strong enough,
but nowhere near
as strong as any
SeeD member.

An officer acting
together with
Galbadian soldiers.
Defeat him first,
before he uses
recovery magic on
the other soldiers.

A Galbadian soldier
assigned to Dollet
communication
tower.
Always picked on by
his superior, Major
Biggs.

A Galbadian Major.
Activated the
Dollet
Communication
Tower.
Very
short-tempered.

President Deling's
double.
Attacks in a
strange way, but
not very strong.
However...

Prison security
guard.
A Galbadian soldier
trained in sleep
magic to capture
escapees.

Master of Balamb
Garden.
Opposes
Headmaster Cid in
trying to control
Balamb Garden.

Esthar soldier who
uses both gun and
sword.  Shotgun
attack can cause
major damage.
Not a strong
enemy.

A cyborg in the
form of an Esthar
soldier, but far
stronger.
It only uses
physical attacks.

NORG's support
system with auto-
recover functions
that restore any
damage.
Uses status-
changing attacks.

NORG's support
system with auto-
recover functions
that restore any
damage.
Uses attack
magics.
NOT A TARGET.

The king of the
Tonberries.
Appears to seek
revenge for all
defeated
Tonberries.

Some Cactuars live
long lives and
grow huge.
This Jumbo Cactuar
is one of those.

Decided to become
a Sorceress'
Knight under Edea.
Uses fire magic in
conjunction with
sword attacks.

Attacks with Edea
to destroy SeeD.
His sword skills
have been refined,
and he has gained
more skills.

Defeated once, and
still trying to fight
to save his pride.
HP is lower due to
the defeat, but
skills are higher.

A powerful
sorceress and
ruler of Galbadia.
Her sorceress
powers may be the
most powerful in the
world.

A monster living
in the Spaceship
Ragnarok.  Very
violent in nature,
it attacks anything
that moves within
the ship.

The strongest,
ultimate monster.
It's said to be
impossible to
defeat.

A monster that
lives in the
abandoned Dollet
communication
tower.
No one knows where
it came from.

Galbadia's mobile
attack weapon.
AKA “Black Widow.”
Doesn't stop until
it kills all enemies
in its path.

A mutation of a
gateway decoration.
Uses Petrify
attacks.
Someone has given
it the Reflect power.

A large monster,
but it mainly uses
magic to attack.
Physical attacks
anger it, and it
may counterattack.

A large insect-type
monster that is a
survivor of some
ancient race.
Uses its large
spikes and tail to
attack.

May look slow due
to its stone-like
body, but it is
actually quite
fast.
May appear in
numbers.

A monster living
in the Spaceship
Ragnarok.  Very
violent in nature,
it attacks anything
that moves within
the ship.

A monster living
in the Spaceship
Ragnarok.  Very
violent in nature,
it attacks anything
that moves within
the ship.

This creature lives
underground.
Its slimy body is
full of oil.
Attacks by spitting
oil.

A sorceress bent
on conquering the
world.
Hired Galbadia
Garden forces to
destroy SeeD, which
stands in her way.

Named Iron Clad
for its defense
capability.
The main cannon
is more powerful
than X-ATMO92's
Ray-Bomb.

Out of control after
being destroyed at
the Missile Base.
Can only fight for
a short amount of
time.

A monster born of
ancient bones deep
in Great Salt Lake.
It's assumed that it
came to life after
the Great Salt Lake
dried up.
NOT A TARGET.

Its beam and laser
attacks go far
beyond the damage
of any modern
weapons.

Mobile Type 8's left
shoulder.
Acts on its own as
a machine.
Has auto-recovery
and attack
functions.

Mobile Type 8's
right shoulder.
Acts on its own as
a machine.
Has auto-recovery
and attack
functions.

Soldier assigned
to Galbadia Garden.
Specializes in sneak
attacks.
Much stronger than
regular Galbadian
soldiers.

Ultimecia gave
partial life to this
weapon of the
future.
Pulse Cannon
destroys any
enemies in its way.

Born from Trauma,
a small support
machine.
Despite its small
size, uses Pulse
Cannon just like
Trauma.

A monster living
in the Spaceship
Ragnarok.  Very
violent in nature,
it attacks anything
that moves within
the ship.

Esthar's ruler
before Laguna and
company confined
her.
Released by
Ultimecia, and
regaining strength.

{Rinoa} being
junctioned by Adel.
Immobile, because
Adel is absorbing
her powers.
Can be released by
defeating Adel.

Stronger than
Ultima Weapon,
Omega Weapon is
the strongest
monster.  It is
bad luck to run
into this monster.

Sorceress from
beyond time who
appeared due to
Time Compression.
Uses magic, but it
is not very
powerful.

Sorceress from
beyond time who
appeared due to
Time Compression.
Uses magic, but it
is not very
powerful.

Sorceress from
beyond time who
appeared due to
Time Compression.
Uses magic, but it
is not very
powerful.
Unidentified flying\nobject from outer\nspace.

Looking for Ellone
under Seifer's
command.
Uses wind magic
and attacks
with Pinwheel.

Looking for Ellone
with Fujin.
Good at physical
attacks.
Tries to act cool
around other
people.

A sorceress trying
to change the world
by compressing time
and taking power
from all
sorceresses.

In {Squall}'s
mind, the strongest
GF.
Through Ultimecia's
power, continues
fighting without
vanishing.
NOT A TARGET.

Ultimecia junctioned
to {Griever}.
A powerful monster
that combines
Ultimecia's and
{Griever}'s
forces.

Ultimecia's magic
power amplifier.
By combining the
2 amplifiers, her
power can be
amplified greatly..

Ultimecia,
transformed to
absorb all time
and space.
Absorbing all
existence as we
speak.

The point from
which Ultimecia's
magic power
generates.
Casts the ultimate
magic through power
generated here.

To retain his pride
as Sorceress'
Knight, he is
determined to win.
His skills are even
more deadly.

A member of
Galbadia Garden's
demi-human ice-
hockey club.
Attacks with speed
and team work.

A giant machine
powered by magic.
Its high defensive
power makes it
difficult to damage,
except with magic
or GF.

A powerful monster.
Uses magic, but
also uses Tail
Needle,
which causes heavy
damage.

Used to be a GF.
Became a monster
under Ultimecia's
power.
Its Dark Flare
destroys all
enemies.

Uses magic as well
as physical
attacks.
Its skill with
Thunder magic
allows it to
increase damage.

Demoted along with
Biggs for his part
in the Dollet
Communication
Tower Operation.
Unfortunately, still
works under Biggs.

He was a major
during the Dollet
Communication
Tower Operation,
but was demoted
after the operation
failed.  Hates SeeD.

Assisting Seifer
inside Lunatic
Pandora.
Uses support magic,
as well as attack
magic.

Works with Fujin
and Seifer.
Still relies on his
strength, but can
now use support
magic as well.
NOT A TARGET.
NOT A TARGET.
NOT A TARGET.
NOT A TARGET.

The monster that
was posing as
President Deling.
Attacks with its
deformed arms and
status-change
attacks.

Galbadia Missile
Base security
soldiers.
Paid a little better
than regular
Galbadian soldiers.
